snippet: A suicide bomber struck outside a Shiite mosque near Islamabad, where guards prevented him from reaching the main prayer hall.
abstract: Suicide bomber sets off explosives outside Shiite mosque in Islamabad, Pakistan, killing at least three people and wounding two; Pakistani Taliban faction Jundullah claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber struck outside a Shiite mosque near Islamabad, where guards prevented him from reaching the main prayer hall.

headline.main: Pakistani Taliban Kill 3 in Suicide Attack at Shiite Mosque
